did.unittitle: Account book of Captain Seth Belknap's company, New York State militia

repository.corpname: The New York Public Library. Manuscripts and Archives Division.

address.addressline: Fifth Avenue at 42nd Street, New York, NY 10018-2788

did.abstract: Account book documenting Captain Seth Belknap's company of the 2nd (Delamater's) Regiment of the New York Militia during the War of 1812 (August-November 1814). Entries record the company's accounts with the United States government and with members of the company. The volume also contains entries relating to substitutes, lists of deserters and furloughed troops. At the time of this account book, the company was stationed at Camp Harlem, New York

prefercite.p: Account book of Captain Seth Belknap's company, New York State militia, Manuscripts and Archives Division, The New York Public Library
